Method Detail

testUTCDayValue

public void testUTCDayValue()
Tests to see that DayCache returns the same Day object for various times in the same day.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Supports performance analysis testing of DayCache. If this main is invoked with "-cache", it invokes the DayCache on times starting now and incrementing by 1 second for the next 364 days. Otherwise, does the same thing but just creates a new Day instance each time.

Initial evaluation indicates that without the cache, it takes around 80 seconds to create a day instance for each second for 100 days. With the cache, it takes around 3 seconds.

Parameters:
args - An arg of "-cache" means use the DayCache.
